column4: Hmmm. I have to admit defeat on this... I downloaded usb-creator.tar.gz, but all I get is some big python app. Isn't there a simple shell script (or similar) at its core which converts .iso to a USB image?
unetbootin can convert just about any iso to a flash drive
unetbootin is a Windows app? Unfortunately I am on Linux, or OpenBSD
there is a windows version as well iirc
Thanks, I found the Linux version. But it is a GUI app with lots of dependencies which are not available to me
